Source.Name: telepathy-farstream
Source.Summary: An effort to create a framework to deal with all known audio/video conferencing protocols
Source.Description: The Farstream (formerly Farsight) project is an effort to create a framework to deal with all known audio/video conferencing protocols. On one side it offers a generic API that makes it possible to write plugins for different streaming protocols, on the other side it offers an API for clients to use those plugins.
